name: Super Duper TopDownShooter
description:
This is a fast paced 2D top down shooter. You have a variety of weapons to choose on to take down the waves of enemies and deafeat an epic boss at the end.

This is my first bigger game I made so don´t wonder if anything isn´t that perfect.

I don´t know why but the grenade doesn´t work in the final build even though it works in the Unity editor. So Don´t buy the grenade it is useless.
